ghostPost.title: T-Shirt Contest: Winning Designs
ghostPost.excerpt: The community has picked it’s Top 3 favorites!
ghostPost.custom_excerpt: The community has picked it’s Top 3 favorites!
ghostPost.plaintext:
The community has picked it’s Top 3 favorites!

Thank you to everyone who contributed designs and voted in our t-shirt design
competition!
We began with 59 great designs by 23 community artists.

Round 1 voting saw over 300 ballots filled and a Top 10 was decided on.

Round 2 voting saw over 800 ballets filled and the Top 3 designs rose to the top
in community voting.

For the final round the Particl team also had a say in the final designs and it
was a hard decision for us because we thought the final 10 designs were all
shirts we could see on our backs ?!

https://imgur.com/a/1q0ZPGeneral report - PART T-shirt design contest: Final
Round [https://particl.typeform.com/report/haELX9/ZIpTFDHvg8rZyQfM]
Turn data collection into an experience with Typeform. Create beautiful online
forms, surveys, quizzes, and so much…
[https://particl.typeform.com/report/haELX9/ZIpTFDHvg8rZyQfM]
particl.typeform.com
[https://particl.typeform.com/report/haELX9/ZIpTFDHvg8rZyQfM]


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

AND THE WINNERS ARE
3️⃣ | Third Place | $250* & Winning Shirt Print
https://github.com/particlcommunity/pops/tree/master/pop-0002/projects/EmailSubmission8
After receiving the most votes to get into the Top 10, this design held onto the
third position in the final voting round while getting stiff competition from
fourth place.

> “ I like 7 for the minimal design. But i would do the text of the logo in
white.” — CRZ
? Lead Designer approved!


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

2️⃣ | Second Place | $500* & Winning Shirt Print
https://github.com/particlcommunity/pops/tree/master/pop-0002/projects/C01Nwatch
This design was my personal favorite. I liked the way the anonymous figure grows
out of pixels (blocks) into its form while holding the Particl emblem.

While some designs only look good on one background, this one translates well to
dark or white colors; even the inverted negative looks cool on pure black.

Nicely done!


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1️⃣ | First Place | $1000* & Winning Shirt Print
https://github.com/particlcommunity/pops/tree/master/pop-0002/projects/EmailSubmission6
Sometimes a subtle tweak is all it takes to make a t-shirt work well. Our first
place winning design clearly promotes the project while having some funwith our
official emblem.

Turning the emblem into a lowercase “a” in Particl adds the slightest flair to
our project’s name and makes a shirt that appeals to just about everyone — as
seen by the voting results.

While perhaps not taking as long to design as some of the other designs, it
still stood up to the competition and came out on top when all was said and
done!

Great job! ?

*Note: Monetary rewards will be paid in PART — closing day price via
CoinMarketCap.com on April 20th, 2018.


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Honorable Mentions
It’s hard to end up with only 3 winners when we had over 50 great designs
submitted. The Particl team went back and forth on modifying the final 3 designs
with other favorites, but in the end, we decided we agreed with the community
voting results.

Not to push aside all the other great designs, we also decided that we’ll do
some limited production runs of some of the shirts we personally appreciated.

Next Steps
 * Winners will be contacted by CryptoGuard for important information we need.
 * All vector work should be sent to CryptoGuard via email cryptoguard (at)
   particl.io
 * If you’re an honorable mention design I’d recommend also sending vector
   artwork to us so we can set up special prints on designs :)

Thank you to all who participated,
This was a fun, exciting promotion! We’ll do more.
ghostPost.html:
The community has picked it’s Top 3 favorites!

Thank you to everyone who contributed designs and voted in our t-shirt design competition!

We began with 59 great designs by 23 community artists.

Round 1 voting saw over 300 ballots filled and a Top 10 was decided on.

Round 2 voting saw over 800 ballets filled and the Top 3 designs rose to the top in community voting.

For the final round the Particl team also had a say in the final designs and it was a hard decision for us because we thought the final 10 designs were all shirts we could see on our backs ?!

General report - PART T-shirt design contest: Final Round
Turn data collection into an experience with Typeform. Create beautiful online forms, surveys, quizzes, and so much…particl.typeform.com

AND THE WINNERS ARE

3️⃣ | Third Place | $250* & Winning Shirt Print

After receiving the most votes to get into the Top 10, this design held onto the third position in the final voting round while getting stiff competition from fourth place.

“ I like 7 for the minimal design. But i would do the text of the logo in white.” — CRZ

? Lead Designer approved!

2️⃣ | Second Place | $500* & Winning Shirt Print

This design was my personal favorite. I liked the way the anonymous figure grows out of pixels (blocks) into its form while holding the Particl emblem.

While some designs only look good on one background, this one translates well to dark or white colors; even the inverted negative looks cool on pure black.

Nicely done!

1️⃣ | First Place | $1000* & Winning Shirt Print

Sometimes a subtle tweak is all it takes to make a t-shirt work well. Our first place winning design clearly promotes the project while having some funwith our official emblem.

Turning the emblem into a lowercase “a” in Particl adds the slightest flair to our project’s name and makes a shirt that appeals to just about everyone — as seen by the voting results.

While perhaps not taking as long to design as some of the other designs, it still stood up to the competition and came out on top when all was said and done!

Great job! ?

*Note: Monetary rewards will be paid in PART — closing day price via CoinMarketCap.com on April 20th, 2018.

Honorable Mentions

It’s hard to end up with only 3 winners when we had over 50 great designs submitted. The Particl team went back and forth on modifying the final 3 designs with other favorites, but in the end, we decided we agreed with the community voting results.

Not to push aside all the other great designs, we also decided that we’ll do some limited production runs of some of the shirts we personally appreciated.

Next Steps

  • Winners will be contacted by CryptoGuard for important information we need.
  • All vector work should be sent to CryptoGuard via email cryptoguard (at) particl.io
  • If you’re an honorable mention design I’d recommend also sending vector artwork to us so we can set up special prints on designs :)

Thank you to all who participated,

This was a fun, exciting promotion! We’ll do more.

The community has picked it’s Top 3 favorites!

Thank you to everyone who contributed designs and voted in our t-shirt design competition!

We began with 59 great designs by 23 community artists.

Round 1 voting saw over 300 ballots filled and a Top 10 was decided on.

Round 2 voting saw over 800 ballets filled and the Top 3 designs rose to the top in community voting.

For the final round the Particl team also had a say in the final designs and it was a hard decision for us because we thought the final 10 designs were all shirts we could see on our backs ?!

General report - PART T-shirt design contest: Final Round
Turn data collection into an experience with Typeform. Create beautiful online forms, surveys, quizzes, and so much…particl.typeform.com

AND THE WINNERS ARE

3️⃣ | Third Place | $250* & Winning Shirt Print

After receiving the most votes to get into the Top 10, this design held onto the third position in the final voting round while getting stiff competition from fourth place.

“ I like 7 for the minimal design. But i would do the text of the logo in white.” — CRZ

? Lead Designer approved!

2️⃣ | Second Place | $500* & Winning Shirt Print

This design was my personal favorite. I liked the way the anonymous figure grows out of pixels (blocks) into its form while holding the Particl emblem.

While some designs only look good on one background, this one translates well to dark or white colors; even the inverted negative looks cool on pure black.

Nicely done!

1️⃣ | First Place | $1000* & Winning Shirt Print

Sometimes a subtle tweak is all it takes to make a t-shirt work well. Our first place winning design clearly promotes the project while having some funwith our official emblem.

Turning the emblem into a lowercase “a” in Particl adds the slightest flair to our project’s name and makes a shirt that appeals to just about everyone — as seen by the voting results.

While perhaps not taking as long to design as some of the other designs, it still stood up to the competition and came out on top when all was said and done!

Great job! ?

*Note: Monetary rewards will be paid in PART — closing day price via CoinMarketCap.com on April 20th, 2018.

Honorable Mentions

It’s hard to end up with only 3 winners when we had over 50 great designs submitted. The Particl team went back and forth on modifying the final 3 designs with other favorites, but in the end, we decided we agreed with the community voting results.

Not to push aside all the other great designs, we also decided that we’ll do some limited production runs of some of the shirts we personally appreciated.

Next Steps

  • Winners will be contacted by CryptoGuard for important information we need.
  • All vector work should be sent to CryptoGuard via email cryptoguard (at) particl.io
  • If you’re an honorable mention design I’d recommend also sending vector artwork to us so we can set up special prints on designs :)

Thank you to all who participated,

This was a fun, exciting promotion! We’ll do more.

prev.excerpt: We are only 6 days away until Particl Project’s decentralized marketplace ALPHA launches for everyone. #BePART of an online shopping…

primary_tag.description: Get up to speed with all the most recent Particl developments!

tags.description: Keep track of all the news related to Particl and its ecosystem!

prev.plaintext:
We are only 6 days away until Particl Project’s decentralized marketplace ALPHA
launches for everyone. #BePART of an online shopping revolution!

Testing has wrapped up
Thank you for all the community testers helping on non-official ALPHA builds the
past 6+ weeks. Both of our Open Dev
[https://riot.im/app/#/room/#particl-dev:matrix.org] and Testing
[https://riot.im/app/#/room/#particl-testing:matrix.org] channels have been busy
with community and team developers, test-vendors and test-customers working on
nearly daily builds across multiple operating systems as we meticulously
corrected bugs/issues.

These days of troubleshooting and problem solving were crucial to getting a
properly working MVP of our decentralized marketplace —which translates into
signed-off official builds of ALPHA. ?

Status Report ?
As of yesterday the status of the marketplace is the following:

 * Build 1016/7 are being tested and proven to be very stable.
 * Issue reported with decimals not showing up in checkout process —Fixed and
   merged
 * Issue reported where multiple items in checkout caused problems when placing
   the order —Fix currently being tested

The time has come!
I’m excited to announce that next Thursday, May 31st, Particl will be releasing
our first Marketplace ALPHA* builds on our Github page. As with all our our
work, our code and interfaces are all open-source and publicly audit-able.

*ALPHA is for Testnet only.

With less than a week and counting, I encourage everyone to keep plugged in and
be part of this huge step for the Particl project. You can find links to all our
social media and community chat channels here
[https://particl.wiki/socialmedia-channels].

More things in the wings
Work never stops when building the future my friends.

I’ve linked to our testing and development channels above and our community
channels as well. Please stay connected, get involved
[https://particl.news/the-partaker-hub-81db23d501] and help us further along
this first milestone of our decentralized marketplace.

As this is built on our test network, users can expect new updates that come
along to fix bugs found in the shopping experience, security patches needed to
protect us, governance features to begin showing up and privacy enhancements to
be regularly added.

Next week we will all have our hands on the first build of a private,
decentralized marketplace aimed at disrupting the way people buy and sell online 
anywhere in the world.

Download, create a store, post some items for sale and #BePART of a revolution.

Thank You
Particl Team

We are only 6 days away until Particl Project’s decentralized marketplace ALPHA launches for everyone. #BePART of an online shopping revolution!

Testing has wrapped up

Thank you for all the community testers helping on non-official ALPHA builds the past 6+ weeks. Both of our Open Dev and Testing channels have been busy with community and team developers, test-vendors and test-customers working on nearly daily builds across multiple operating systems as we meticulously corrected bugs/issues.

These days of troubleshooting and problem solving were crucial to getting a properly working MVP of our decentralized marketplace — which translates into signed-off official builds of ALPHA. ?

Status Report ?

As of yesterday the status of the marketplace is the following:

  • Build 1016/7 are being tested and proven to be very stable.
  • Issue reported with decimals not showing up in checkout process — Fixed and merged
  • Issue reported where multiple items in checkout caused problems when placing the order — Fix currently being tested

The time has come!

I’m excited to announce that next Thursday, May 31st, Particl will be releasing our first Marketplace ALPHA* builds on our Github page. As with all our our work, our code and interfaces are all open-source and publicly audit-able.

*ALPHA is for Testnet only.

With less than a week and counting, I encourage everyone to keep plugged in and be part of this huge step for the Particl project. You can find links to all our social media and community chat channels here.

More things in the wings

Work never stops when building the future my friends.

I’ve linked to our testing and development channels above and our community channels as well. Please stay connected, get involved and help us further along this first milestone of our decentralized marketplace.

As this is built on our test network, users can expect new updates that come along to fix bugs found in the shopping experience, security patches needed to protect us, governance features to begin showing up and privacy enhancements to be regularly added.

Next week we will all have our hands on the first build of a private, decentralized marketplace aimed at disrupting the way people buy and sell online anywhere in the world.

Download, create a store, post some items for sale and #BePART of a revolution.

Thank You

Particl Team

next.title: T-Shirt Contest: Top 10 Selected!
next.excerpt: Final week of voting starts NOW!| Pick Top 3 | Duration: 1 Week
next.custom_excerpt: Final week of voting starts NOW!| Pick Top 3 | Duration: 1 Week
next.plaintext:
Final week of voting starts NOW!| Pick Top 3 | Duration: 1 Week

Thank you to everyone who voted in Round 1 of our t-shirt design competition!
The goal of the first round was to pick a Top 10 out of the 59 awesome designs
submitted. Here are the direct voting results:

https://imgur.com/a/Pql4JWe had a fairly decent organic voting turnout — a
little manipulation [speculating ?] — but good participation just the same. A
total of 376 ballots were submitted and all the designs received some votes!

Finalizing Top 10
Since this is the community’s contest we wanted to make sure the Top 10 truly
represented a fun collection of the best designs and equally lets the most
amount of designers into the Top 3 voting round.

After consulting with you guys we all decided to eliminate 5 designs that
received some of the most votes — but would give us trouble with copyright
infringement or print-ability — and included down to the top 15 by votes.

Who’s in?
While all the designs submitted hit the target for creativity and taking a new
spin the Particl brand, these 10 stood above the rest. These are you designs
moving into the next round of voting!

> High Resolution gallary for Top 10 designs: https://imgur.com/a/1q0ZP
Who’s out?
These designs are amazing but are being eliminated because of copyright and/or
print-ability issues. I know we have some t-shirt printing shops in our
community that have the ability to do a wider range of printing than we can for
this contest… I imagine you may see these or more show up in some storefronts on
Particl Marketplace in the future.

Round 2 Voting Starts Today!
You have helped us pick the Top 10 out of 59 amazing designs. Now help us pick
the Top 3.

 * Top 3 voting runs from April 14th to April 20th, 15:00 UTC
 * Particl Team will also vote on their Top 3 and the final winners will be a
   combination of community/team voting results.
 * First, Second and Third place will be announced on our next AMA+FAQ
   livestream April 20th
 * Please only vote once so everyone has a chance to succeed. Thanks :)

Remember, you can vote for up to 3 designs. The goal is to find ourselves a Top
3 and crown the winners!

> VOTE HERE ? https://particl.typeform.com/to/haELX9
Prizes:
 * 1st Place: $1,000 + winning shirt
 * 2nd Place: $500 + winning shirt
 * 3rd Place: $250 + winning shirt

Note: Monetary rewards will be paid in PART

The contest headquarters is on our Particl Community Github page here:

particlcommunity/pops
[https://github.com/particlcommunity/pops/blob/master/pop-0002.mediawiki]
pops — Particl Opportunity Proposals (POP)
[https://github.com/particlcommunity/pops/blob/master/pop-0002.mediawiki]
github.com
[https://github.com/particlcommunity/pops/blob/master/pop-0002.mediawiki]

Thanks,
Congrats to the Top 10 — Best of luck to all of you!

Since this is the community’s contest we wanted to make sure the Top 10 truly represented a fun collection of the best designs and equally lets the most amount of designers into the Top 3 voting round.

After consulting with you guys we all decided to eliminate 5 designs that received some of the most votes — but would give us trouble with copyright infringement or print-ability — and included down to the top 15 by votes.
While all the designs submitted hit the target for creativity and taking a new spin the Particl brand, these 10 stood above the rest. These are you designs moving into the next round of voting!
High Resolution gallary for Top 10 designs:

but are being eliminated because of copyright and/or print-ability issues. I know we have some t-shirt printing shops in our community that have the ability to do a wider range of printing than we can for this contest…
I imagine you may see these or more show up in some storefronts on Particl Marketplace in the future.
You have helped us pick the Top 10 out of 59 amazing designs. Now help us pick the Top 3.
Top 3 voting runs from April 14th to April 20th, 15:00 UTC
Particl Team will also vote on their Top 3 and the final winners will be a combination of community/team voting results.
First, Second and Third place will be announced on our next AMA+FAQ livestream April 20th
so everyone has a chance to succeed. Thanks :)
Remember, you can vote for up to 3 designs. The goal is to find ourselves a Top 3 and crown the winners!
Note: Monetary rewards will be paid in PART
The contest headquarters is on our Particl Community Github page here:
Congrats to the Top 10 — Best of luck to all of you!

tableOfContents.heading: Thank you to everyone who voted in Round 1 of our t-shirt design competition!
